sentences.en: The floodwater hit the village with particular ferocity, demolishing around 200 houses.
sentences.cn: 凶猛的洪水冲毁了这个村庄，毁掉了200多间房屋。

sentences.en: The police were shocked by the ferocity of the attack.
sentences.cn: 警方对那起攻击的凶残感到震惊。

sentences.en: His intensity and the ferocity of his feelings alarmed me.
sentences.cn: 他的过分认真和激烈的感受令我恐慌。
